pr_title: HADOOP-17092. ABFS: Making AzureADAuthenticator.getToken() throw HttpException if a…

timeline.message: ABFS: Making AzureADAuthenticator.getToken() throw HttpException if all the retries are failed. This is to indiacate no retry is required at AbfsRestOperation.executeHttpOperation(). Introduced delay inbetween retries.

timeline.author: snvijaya

timeline.bodyText:
As every OAuth token provider eventually calls this method to get token, you will just need to create an instance of exponential retry right here with the configured values ?
Is there any benefit creating and passing down exponential retry instance from each of the token provider ?
